title: Oath Keepers Militia Members Face Seditious Conspiracy Charges
description:
Jury selection has begun in the trail of five members or associates of the far-right group over their alleged role in the Jan. 6th riot at the U.S. Capitol. The charges are the most serious that the Justice Department has pursued in conjunction with the attack.

This episode: White House correspondent Tamara Keith, justice correspondent Ryan Lucas, and congressional correspondent Claudia Grisales.

Learn more about upcoming live shows of The NPR Politics Podcast at nprpresents.org.
